hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{6} \text{ dangerous snakes}\\
+&  \underline{\blue4 \text{ not dangerous}}\\
=&\pink{10} \text{ snakes in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Ernie saw some snakes.

$6$ of them were dangerous, and $4$ were not. 

**How many snakes did Ernie see in all? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] snakes
